definitions.title: adj.
definitions.body: fair, beautiful;—m. abs. [[יׇפֶה]] 2Sa 14:25 + 4 t.; cstr. [[יְפֵה]] Ge 39:6, Ge 39:6 + 6 t.; f. [[יׇפָה]] Ge 12:14 + 14 t.; cstr. [[יְפַת]]; Ge 2:11+ 6 t.; sf. [[יׇפָתִי]] Ct So 2:10, So 2:13; pl. [[יׇפוֹת]] Job 42:15, Am 8:13; cstr. [[יְפוֹת]] Ge 41:2; [[יְפׂת]] v:Ge 41:4, v:Ge 41:18; —fair, beautiful, as attribute of woman 2Sa 13:1, 1Ki 1:3, Am 8:13, Pr 11:22; cf. Job 42:15, Ct So 6:10 ([[כלבנה]] ´[[י]]); pred. Ge 12:14, 1Ki 1:4, Ct So 1:15, So 1:15, So 4:1, So 4:1, So 4:7, So 6:4; = subst. fair one So 1:8, So 2:10, So 2:13, So 5:9, So 6:1; oft. cstr. [[יְפַת־]] [[מַרְאֶה]] Ge 12:11, Ge 29:17, 2Sa 14:27; [[יְפַת־תּׂאַר]] Ge 29:17, 1Sa 25:3, De 21:11, Es 2:7: of kine [[יְפוֹת־מַרְאֶה]] Ge 41:2, cf. v:Ge 41:4; [[יְפוֹת־תּׂאַר]] v:Ge 41:18; less oft. of boy, young man [[אִישׁ יׇפֶה]] 2Sa 14:25; pred. Ct So 1:16; [[יְפֵה תׂאַר]] Ge 39:6; [[וִיפֵה מַרְאֶה]] v:Ge 39:6 (of Joseph); of Jerusalem [[יְפֵה נוֹף]] Ps 48:3; of a singer [[יְפֵה קוֹל]] Ez Eze 33:32; of trees: olive [[יְפֵה פְרִי־תׂאַר]] Je 11:16; cedar (fig. of Egypt) [[יְפֵה עָנׇף]] Ez Eze 31:3, cf. v:Eze 31:9; [[יׇפֶה]] of everything in its time Ec 3:11; of various acts Ec 5:17.—In [[יְפֵה עֵינַיִם עִם]] 1Sa 16:12, [[עִם יְפֵה מַרְאֶה]] 1Sa 17:42, either [[יפה]] = subst. abstr. with beauty of eyes, or [[עִם]] is textual error (Gr Krenkel:ZAW, 1882, 309 Bu [[עֶלֶם]] youth), v. Dr.
